subclassFeature.name: College of Masks
entries: When you choose this college at 3rd level, you learn songs that are fueled by bardic inspiration dice.

subclassFeature.name: Bard Inspiration Dice
entries: You use your Enchanted Masks at the cost of your Bardic Inspiration dice. An inspiration die is expended when you use it for a transformation or for the use of your Bardic Inspiration ability. The number of Bardic Inspiration dice you get, their size, as well as when you replenish them follow the same rules for the Bard Class as mentioned in the Player's Handbook.

subclassFeature.name: Saving Throws
entries: Any spells that require your target to make a saving throw to resist the song's effects. The saving throw DC your bard Spell save DC unless otherwise mentioned.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: When you join the College of Masks at 3rd level, you gain proficiency in the Slight of Hand and Deception skills.

subclassFeature.name: Enchanted Masks
entries: You gain the ability to enchant masks you craft into objects of your benefit, choose one mask for this level to gain its benefits

subclassFeature.name: Enchanted Masks
entries: You learn to further enhance your masks in order to aid you, choose one mask for this level to gain its benefits

subclassFeature.name: Enchanted Masks
entries: You've mastered your craft and can take a final enhancement from your craft, choose one mask for this level to gain its benefits

subclassFeature.name: Sickening Morph
entries: At level 14, . The maximum number of uses of bardic inspiration that you can regain this way is equal to your charisma modifier. You regain the use of this ability when you finish a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: The Sickly Mask
entries: You can spend an inspiration die and use your Action to attempt to poison a creature, they must make a constitiution save DC against your spell casting or take {@dice d10} poison damage
{@b At Higher Levels.} Starting at 6th level, you may spend additional inspiration dice on this song. Each additional inspiration die grants an extra {@dice d8} necrotic damage

optionalfeature.name: The Magical Mask
entries: You can spend an inspiration die and use your Action to hurl animated objects at a creature, or object. It takes {@dice d8} blugeoning damage and must make a strength save agianst your spell DC or be knocked prone
{@b At Higher Levels.} Starting at 6th level, you may spend additional inspiration dice on this song. Each additional inspiration die grants an extra {@dice d8} blugeoning damage and adds 1 to the DC

optionalfeature.name: The Festive Mask
entries: You can spend an inspiration die and use your Action to attempt to charm a creature, they must make a charisma saving throw against your spell DC
{@b At Higher Levels.} Starting at 6th level, you may spend additional inspiration dice on this song. Each additional inspiration die lets you charm an additional target.

optionalfeature.name: The Rage Mask
entries: You can spend an inspiration die and use your bonus action to make an attack.
{@b At Higher Levels.} Starting at 6th level, you may spend additional inspiration dice on this song. Each additional inspiration die deals damage equal to the dice roll of your weapons damage type.

optionalfeature.name: The Plague Mask
entries: You can spend an inspiration die and use your Action to attempt to subdue a creature, they must make a constitiution save DC against your spell casting or gaina a level of exhaustion. They may repeat the save at the end of each of their turns.

optionalfeature.name: The Ritual Mask
entries: When you hit a creature with a spell, you can you use your bonus action to expend one inspiration die to double the spells effect, this cannot be done on concentration spells.

optionalfeature.name: The Celebratory Mask
entries: When you hit a creature with a spell you can you use your bonus action to expend one inspiration die; they must make a charasima save against your spell DC, if they fail they must skip their next turn to dance.

optionalfeature.name: The Fierce Mask
entries: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack you can you use your bonus action to expend one inspiration die; they must make a charasima save against your spell DC, if they fail they are frigtened of you.

optionalfeature.name: The Deathly Mask
entries: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack you can you use your bonus action to expend one inspiration die; they must make a constituition save against your spell DC, if they fail they become unconcious until the end of their next turn.

optionalfeature.name: The Casters Mask
entries: When you hit a creature with a spell attack you can you use your bonus action to expend two inspiration die; your spell affects are tripled, this does not work with concentration spells.

optionalfeature.name: The Carnival Mask
entries: When you hit a creature with a spell attack you can you use your bonus action to expend two inspiration die; all creatures within 10 ft of the creature must make a wisdom save against your spell DC, if they fail they are stunned until the end of their next turn.

optionalfeature.name: The Warriors Mask
entries: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack you can you use your bonus action to expend three inspiration die; you gain 1 use of action surge. This may only be used once per day.
